name: ShoppingLive.ru
overview:
ShoppingLive.ru is a Russian online teleshopping channel providing a convenient and accessible shopping solution. The website broadcasts short and entertaining live videos to showcase the products available for purchase and its easy navigation characteristics enable shoppers to find the right products quickly and effectively.

ShoppingLive.ru offers an extensive product range that includes modern appliances, kitchen accessories, home gyms and health products as well as stylish jewellery for women - all of which can be delivered to anywhere in Russia.

ShoppingLive CEO Ilya Kirik has extensive experience in international trading and serves as a founder and an entrepreneur for companies involved in international trade and finance. Other members of the team have experience in investment analysis (Renova, JV Renove-Rusnano, direct marketing (DHL, TopShop, PPE Group), internet marketing (Begun) and TV marketing (TNT, Video International, Gallup Media, ProfMedia).

Shoppinglive.ru was launched by Fast Lane Ventures and is modelled on QVC Inc., one of the largest multimedia retailers in the world.

In April 2012 Fast Lane Ventures sells its stake in ShoppingLive business to German based Group – Home Shopping Europe.

For more information, please visit www.shoppinglive.ru

milestones.description: Fast Lane Ventures sells Shopping Live business to Home Shopping Europe
milestones.source_description: Russia’s Fast Lane flips again with Shopping Live sale
